alert.note: Alert for Christian; Logan; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:55AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Tazewell, Logan and Christian Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute this evening and any travel Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher snowfall amounts 3 to 5 inches are expected toward the west with even higher amounts possible in far west central Illinois.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
